content:
Oof, is anyone aware of https://github.com/actions/virtual-environments/issues/4060?

The rust-lang/rust xcode is intentionally lowered to 12.2 which is being removed.

I can maybe investigate more later today if nobody has looked at it already.
Hm, looks like we should at least pin our builders temporarily to give us some more time
I don't think anyone saw this yet
Fortunately due to a bug in xcode-select.sh, the macos-11 image appears to be working. So I don't think there is anything that particularly needs to be done.
